title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. A, art. 6, pt. 185 - Additions To Tax And Civil Penalties
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. A, art. 6, pt. 185 - Additions To Tax And Civil Penalties

State Regulations
§ 185.3 - Failure to pay estimated tax
§ 185.4 - Exceptions to addition to tax for failure to pay estimated tax

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. A, art. 6, pt. 185

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§ 171, 475, 509[7], 697, 1096 [a], 1142[1], [8], 1250, 1415[a]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
